challenge_deck.name: Find a store with too much merch
challenge_deck.description:
The store must sell food or drink.
The store must have 4 or more types of merch.
Each type must be a different category of clothing or product.

challenge_deck.name: Attend a local event
challenge_deck.description:
The event must have at least 10 people in attendance.
The event must have some kind of public advertisement (facebook event, web page, poster).
You must attend for at least 10 minutes.

challenge_deck.name: Find a language law violation
challenge_deck.description:
Find signs or text on businesses displayed exclusively in a language other than French, or with another language more prominent than French.

The words must not be people’s names, trademarks, or the name of the business.

challenge_deck.name: Find something from your tattoo
challenge_deck.description:
Find something that a team member has a tattoo of.
The thing must be physical and the main subject of the tattoo.

challenge_deck.name: Lecture at a university
challenge_deck.description: Visit a university’s main campus. While there, give a lecture of at least 5 minutes on a topic of your choice.

challenge_deck.name: Paint a local landscape
challenge_deck.description:
Your painting must be recognisably a local landscape.
You must be looking at the landscape while painting it.
Your painting must use at least 3 colours.
Your painting does not need to use paint, but must be physical.

challenge_deck.name: Do an art walk
challenge_deck.description:
Visit three pieces of art in the Montreal Public Art database.
https://artpublicmontreal.ca/en//collection/carte.

challenge_deck.name: Go one kilometre
challenge_deck.description:
One team member must pick a random direction by spinning around with eyes closed.

Find the point exactly 1km in that direction using google maps.

Go to within 10 metres of that point.

If that point is in another neighbourhood, claim both neighbourhoods.

If the point is inaccessible, spin again.

challenge_deck.name: Stalk a squirrel
challenge_deck.description: Film a squirrel without interruption for 2 minutes.

challenge_deck.name: Walk the neighbourhood
challenge_deck.description:
Walk the entirety of the longest straight site of the neighbourhood, as defined by our game map.

A side with an angle of less than 10 degrees is considered straight.

For example, the longest straight side of the Plateau neighbourhood is Sherbrooke St.

challenge_deck.name: Anticipate the metro doors
challenge_deck.description:
One team member must stand in one space on the metro platform. 

When the metro comes to a complete stop, the doors must be in front of at least part of your body (including arms).

Only one team member may attempt at a time.

challenge_deck.name: Get boba
challenge_deck.description: Get boba. The boba must be in a drinkable state (e.g. not a kit)

challenge_deck.name: Cry near a lighthouse
challenge_deck.description: Visit the Ile St Helene Lighthouse. Cry.

challenge_deck.name: Translate at a library
challenge_deck.description: Find the same book in English and French at a library.

challenge_deck.name: Post something attractive.
challenge_deck.description:
Take a photo and post it on social media.
The photo must get at least 10 likes or equivalent within 10 minutes.
Team members may not participate.

challenge_deck.name: Give a piggyback
challenge_deck.description:
A team member must give another team member a piggyback around the entire perimeter of a park.
You may switch the team members during the challenge.

challenge_deck.name: Confess your sins at three churches
challenge_deck.description: Visit three churches. While there, one player must confess three sins.

challenge_deck.name: Cross the same river twice.
challenge_deck.description:
Cross part or all of the St Laurent or the canal, then cross back. 
You must use two different methods of transport, or two different crossing points.
Claim the neighbourhood where you started and ended your crossings. If you crossed between two neighbourhoods, claim both.

challenge_deck.name: Become a beaver at Beaver Lake
challenge_deck.description:
Go to Beaver Lake. While there:

Bite through a plant, causing it to fall over.
Eat something containing fish
Decrease the impact of climate change.

challenge_deck.name: At long last, transport water between two fountains.
challenge_deck.description:
Transport water from a fountain in one neighbourhood to a fountain in another. Claim both neighbourhoods.

The fountain must not be intended for drinking. 

The fountain must be decorative and have flowing water.

challenge_deck.name: Get high
challenge_deck.description:
Choose a starting point. Starting from that point, ascend 20 metres.
Note: iPhone compass app has elevation.

challenge_deck.name: Win a prize from a claw machine
challenge_deck.description: Get any object out of a claw machine, using the claw.

challenge_deck.name: Eat something local
challenge_deck.description: Visit Little Italy, Little Maghreb or Chinatown. Eat something from the relevant cuisine.

challenge_deck.name: Find the Montreal Flag
challenge_deck.description:
Find:
A cross

A pine tree

A fleur-de-lys

A red rose

A clover

A purple thistle flower

challenge_deck.name: Find something worth $27
challenge_deck.description: The item must be priced at $27 rounded to the nearest dollar before tax.

challenge_deck.name: Have Fun
challenge_deck.description:
Have fun for 15 minutes.
You must be doing a fun activity for the entire 15 minutes.
You must be within the neighbourhood for the entire 15 minutes.

challenge_deck.name: Go home and change into shorts
challenge_deck.description: Go to your house. Put on some shorts.

challenge_deck.name: You are here
challenge_deck.description:
Find something displaying the name of this neighbourhood.
The thing must not be a street sign, on a map, or be intended to help with navigation.

challenge_deck.name: Visit an interesting thing
challenge_deck.description:
Visit a thing. The thing must be a specific individual physical thing, not a type of thing.

After choosing your thing, search for a video about the thing. If there is a video with more than 500 views, you complete this challenge. If not, discard this card and draw a new one.

The video must mention or directly reference the thing in the title.

challenge_deck.name: Bagel taste test
challenge_deck.description:
One team member must do a blind taste test with bagels from St Viator and Fairmount. The team member must identify which is which.

The bagels must be the same flavour.

If you fail, discard this card and draw a new one.

challenge_deck.name: Know someone who lives around here
challenge_deck.description:
Visit a house or building where someone you personally know used to live or currently lives. 
Tell your team about it.

challenge_deck.name: Find a staircase rainbow.
challenge_deck.description:
Find one street-facing staircase which is mainly the following colours:
Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple.
Each staircase must be clearly and indisputably this colour.
Each staircase must have at least 5 stairs.

challenge_deck.name: Play a musical instrument
challenge_deck.description:
Play a real musical instrument.
The instrument cannot be improvised, intended for children, or something you have with you.

challenge_deck.name: Photograph a cat
challenge_deck.description: The cat must be an actual real life cat.

challenge_deck.name: Go to an alliterative metro
challenge_deck.description:
Go to a metro station that has the same first letter as the first name of a member of your team (real name, not a nickname). 

Describe the metro station using three adjectives which start with the same letter.

challenge_deck.name: Send Michael a birthday card
challenge_deck.description: Hand-deliver a birthday card to Michael’s house.

challenge_deck.name: Write an ode to another team
challenge_deck.description:
Send a complementary poem to another team.
The poem must be positive about the other team.
The poem must include a rhyme for each of the other team’s names.
The poem must be at least 8 lines long.

challenge_deck.name: Be a tourist
challenge_deck.description: Take a selfie at Habitat 67, the Oratory, or the Olympic Stadium.

curse_deck.name: Taboo
curse_deck.description:
Until you complete a challenge, no team member may say any of the words which appear on the challenge card. 
If you do, you must stop moving and pause any attempts to complete the challenge for 2 minutes.

curse_deck.name: Walk sideways
curse_deck.description: For the next 15 minutes, all team members must walk sideways. Your feet and torso must be pointed at a 90 degree angle to the direction you are moving while walking.

curse_deck.name: Metro snacks
curse_deck.description: For the next hour, any time you enter a metro station, you must buy a snack before you leave or get on a train.

curse_deck.name: Stop for ice cream
curse_deck.description: Before you complete your next challenge, at least one team member must acquire and eat ice cream.

curse_deck.name: Curse of the Vampire
curse_deck.description:
Until you complete a challenge, you may not:
- cross flowing water (including on the metro)
- eat garlic
- enter a church

curse_deck.name: Get ratatouilled
curse_deck.description:
Look up the Smithsonian’s Naked Mole Rat live cam. 
Watch the first direction the rat moves (Up-camera, down-camera, left, right).
Before you claim any more neighbourhods, you must visit a neighbourhood in that direction relative to your current neighbourhood.
If there is no neighbourhood in that direction, repeat the process.
If the rat is not visible after 2 minutes, the curse does not apply.

curse_deck.name: Nicknames
curse_deck.description:
Come up with a nickname for each team member. 
Until the end of the game, you must refer to them exclusively by their nickname. 
If you use their real name, you must pause for 1 minute.

curse_deck.name: Let’s Not Google It
curse_deck.description:
Until you complete a challenge, you may not use Google Maps or Apple Maps to plan routes or research locations.
You may still use Google Earth to determine your neighbourhood.
You may ignore this curse during battles.

challenge_deck.name: Stalk a squirrel
challenge_deck.description: Film a squirrel without interruption for 2 minutes.

Find the point exactly 1km in that direction using google maps.

Go to within 10 metres of that point.

If that point is in another neighbourhood, claim both neighbourhoods.

If the point is inaccessible, spin again.

battle_deck.name: Find something interesting.
battle_deck.description:
10 mins
Visit something that has a Wikipedia article. The Wikipedia article with the longest body section (by number of words) wins.

battle_deck.name: Drink a beer in the park
battle_deck.description: Acquire a beer. While in a park, completely drink the beer (non-alcoholic beer is acceptable).

battle_deck.name: Find the most foreign licence plate.
battle_deck.description:
Time: 5 minutes
Find the licence plate from the state or province the furthest away.
Distance is measured from the capital of the region the licence plate is from.

battle_deck.name: Play catch
battle_deck.description:
Choose an object. Throw that object at least 10 metres between team members 5 times in a row without the object touching the ground. 
Once you have chosen, you may not change objects.

battle_deck.name: Find the most expensive item
battle_deck.description:
5 minutes.
The item must have an advertised price e.g. a price tag or sticker
The item must be something a person can carry in one hand
The item cannot be access to or information about something else, e.g. a key or a gift card

battle_deck.name: Share an embarrassing fact
battle_deck.description:
5 minutes
One team member must share an embarrassing fact about themselves with the chat.
The non-participating teams will vote on which is the most embarrassing.

battle_deck.name: Visit something mid
battle_deck.description: Visit something with an exactly 3.5 stars rating on google.

battle_deck.name: Flip a bottle.
battle_deck.description:
Flip a bottle, causing it to land on its lid and remain upright for at least 1 second.
Your flip must start with the bottle upright.
The bottle must have a screw top.

battle_deck.name: Flip 5 heads in a row.
battle_deck.description: Flip a heads five times in a row using a real Canadian coin. The flip must be fair.

battle_deck.name: Find a mushroom
battle_deck.description: Find a naturally growing mushroom. First team to send images of a mushroom wins.

battle_deck.name: Find the most expensive car.
battle_deck.description:
Time: 5 minutes.
Price is measured by ticket price advertised by the car company.

battle_deck.name: Get wet
battle_deck.description: At least one team member must be in water at least 30cm deep

battle_deck.name: Drink espresso on the go
battle_deck.description: One team member must drink a shot of espresso.

battle_deck.name: Visit something excellent
battle_deck.description:
5 mins
Visit something with a rating on google maps. Highest rated thing wins.
In the case of a tie, the thing with the most ratings wins.

battle_deck.name: Photograph the most birds
battle_deck.description:
10 mins
Each picture must be of a different bird.
The birds must be real and alive.

battle_deck.name: Get wet.
battle_deck.description: One team member must get into water that is at least a foot deep.
